name: Bambowtie Classic
description:
Bambowtie is a bamboo bow tie handmade by community members from Gawad Kalinga, a community development organization in the Philippines. 

Proceeds from Bambowtie sales support sustainable livelihoods and contribute to a scholarship fund for the children in the Gawad Kalinga (www.gk1world.com) village where they are made.

The Bambowtie Classic is our original and most popular design. Unique eco-style for the sustainably stylish.


Materials: 
bamboo, cord, coin, wood bead

Dimensions: 
4.5" x 1.5" (115 mm x 37 mm)

"Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/bambowtie

Proceeds from Bambowtie sales support sustainable livelihoods and contribute to a scholarship fund for the children in the Gawad Kalinga (www.gk1world.com) village where they are made.

name: Bambowtie Victoria
description:
The Bambowtie Victoria is handmade by the lovely ladies in Gawad Kalinga Victoria in the Philippines for lovely ladies around the world.

Proceeds from Bambowtie sales support sustainable livelihoods and contribute to a scholarship fund for the children in the Gawad Kalinga (www.gk1world.com) village where they are made. 

This Bambowtie Victoria is great for any occasion.  This version features a slide design that wears like an adjustable necklace .You can wear it in your rural town or on the runway.

Materials: 
bamboo, cord, coin, wood beads

Dimensions: 
4.25" x 2" (108 mm x 50mm)

"Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/bambowtie

name: Bambigote - Bamboo Mustache
description:
The Bambigote is a handcrafted bamboo mustache made by the community members of Gawad Kalinga, a sustainable development organization in the Philippines.

Proceeds from Bambowtie sales support sustainable livelihoods and contribute to a scholarship fund for the children in the Gawad Kalinga (www.gk1world.com) village where they are made.

This Bambigote is great for any occasion. This version wears like a necklace that can be brought up to your lip easily for incredible mustache photos!

Materials: 
bamboo, cord, wood beads

Dimensions: 
4.25" x 2" (108 mm x 25mm)

"Like" us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/bambowtie
